snippet: An unusual pairing, Police Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly and the political activist Lenora B. Fulani, stood next to one another during a news conference.
abstract: New York City Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly and political activist Dr Lenora B Fulani are an unusual pairing as they hold news conference about relations between the police and black and Latino youth; Kelly's appearance with Fulani comes amid rising tensions over the force's aggressive street-stop practices and a recent rash of shootings in which at least three children were shot as young rivals exchanged gunfire.
lead_paragraph: An unusual pairing, Police Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly and the political activist Lenora B. Fulani, stood next to one another during a news conference.

headline.seo: Commissioner Kelly and Lenora Fulani Team Up Against Gun Violence
headline.main: In Harlem, a Surprising Pair, Allied Against Violence
headline.print_headline: A Surprising Pair, Allied Against Violence
